description:
Father's Day has come a little early for Benedict Cumberbatch. The actor and his wife Sophie Hunter have welcomed a baby boy Saturday (June 13), People confirms.对于Benedict Cumberbatch来说，父亲节来得比普通人的要早一些。《People》杂志确认，这位著名男星和妻子Sophie Hunter在周六迎来了他们的第一个孩子。

"Benedict Cumberbatch and Sophie Hunter are delighted to announce the arrival of their beautiful son," Cumberbatch's rep said in a statement. "We would kindly ask everyone to respect the family's privacy during these next few precious weeks."“Benedict Cumberbatch和Sophie Hunter夫妇高兴地向外界宣布，他们迎来了一个漂亮的孩子，”Cumberbatch的经纪人说。“我们希望大家在接下来的几周里能够尊重这个家庭的隐私。”

Cumberbatch and Hunter, who is an actress and theater director, were married on Valentine's Day 2015 in England. Cumberbatch和Hunter在2015年情人节当天结婚，Hunter是戏剧演员和导演。

The couple have yet to reveal their son's name. 这对夫妇暂时还未向外公布他们孩子的名字。

title: Benedict Cumberbatch当爸爸了！
